verbose_text: Incomplete removal of PVP upon a single treatment with NaBH 4 contrasts with treatment of unsupported colloidal Au particles, for which addition of an excess of NaBH 4 caused quantitative PVP desorption.8a Therefore the presence of a support material reduces the efficiency of PVP desorption from Au by treatment with NaBH 4.
evidence: Au particles, for which addition of an excess of NaBH 4  caused quantitative PVP desorption.8a
